amendment.description: To enable local educational agencies to use funds under part A of title I for dual or concurrent enrollment programs at eligible schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2083 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2083 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4922-4923; text: CR S4923) To enable local educational agencies to use funds under part A of title I for dual or concurrent enrollment programs at eligible schools.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2083 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2083 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2089.
